name: Time It Right - Perfect Puzzle
description:
Time it right & tap when you think you got it. If you time it right, the ball will go through perfectly. Can you time it right?

• Unique Timing game
• Free to play
• Fun to play for everyone
• Lots of levels to pass
developers: HRY GROUP BILISIM INSAAT SANAYI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: HRY GROUP BILISIM INSAAT SANAYI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
